4. "selleks et olla mõistuspärane soovija" (in order to be a rational wish-maker) is translated as "in order to be a rational wish" in the machine translation. The reference translation correctly captures the idea of being a "rational wish-maker."

Step 3: Evaluate the quality of the machine translation.

The machine translation is mostly accurate, but it misses the nuance of "rational wish-maker" in the source text. The reference translation captures this nuance better. Overall, the machine translation is of good quality, but it could be improved by capturing the nuance of "rational wish-maker."
